skills.name: Thundering Blow
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a thundering blow that shakes the ground and stuns the target for 1 turn with a 75% chance. The damage increases accordingly to your Defense.

skills.name: Natural Stance
skills.description: Circulates the body with chi to increase the Defense for 3 turns and counterattacks when you're attacked. Also, recovers your HP by 15%.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill
